description: The AWS::Macie::Session resource specifies a new Amazon Macie session. A session is an object that represents the Amazon Macie service. A session is required for Amazon Macie to become operational.

Status.description: A enumeration value that specifies the status of the Macie Session.
Status.markdownDescription:
A enumeration value that specifies the status of the Macie Session.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | PAUSED  
Update requires: No interruption

FindingPublishingFrequency.description: A enumeration value that specifies how frequently finding updates are published.
FindingPublishingFrequency.markdownDescription:
A enumeration value that specifies how frequently finding updates are published.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: FIFTEEN_MINUTES | ONE_HOUR | SIX_HOURS  
Update requires: No interruption

AwsAccountId.markdownDescription:
AWS account ID of customer

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceRole.markdownDescription:
Service role used by Macie

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
